main: ^Lemon, I would like to propose a game.
^A game? Well if you're down to lose I'm down to play because I'm guaranteed to kick ur butt
^Your confidence is amusing, especially considering I haven't even told you what we're playing.
^Yes, we will toss a lit Bluebomb between each other, and whoever is holding it when it goes off is the loser.
^Sounds like a completely reasonable and normal game to me. What does the winner get?
^Winner escapes the shame of being the one to tell Strawberry that we played "Don't Explode".
good: ^The two toss the bomb between each other quickly, before eventually exploding in Blueberry's hand.
^You are honorable and challenging, I look forward to battling you again, given that Strawberry does not confiscate my explosives.
^Hey I'll back you up, if you need me to I'll help hide your bandolier.
^Thanks Lemon, I'll be taking you up on that. Immediately.
bad: ^Why are you holding it for so long.
^I know exactly how long it takes for the fuse to burn.
^There's nothing in the rules that prevents strategy based on outside knowledge.
^There's nothing in the rules that says I won't kick your ass after this.
